channel.title: Trugul - Social Random chat idea
channel.description: So i had a sudden idea and that is make a omegle like website but more secure using social networking API and user accounts you could search for people looking for help in math, gaming , web development, you could add tags to your account and get a list of random people with the same interest of course this is just a idea and i was wondering what you guys would think! also do you guys think this would be a good learning process for me to do

item.title: Trugul - Social Random chat idea
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

Doesn’t omegle already let you type in your interests and it matches you with similar people? So just omegle + social media logins and the ability to search for users as oppose to getting a random connection? Do I still have to add them before I can just bust in on their webcams? Sounds like a fuckload of hassle for me to just get my cock out for some strangers

Read full topic

item.title: Trugul - Social Random chat idea
item.dc:creator: @Trugul95 Trugul95
item.description:
@Trugul95 wrote:

I was using that as a example per say it basicly matches you with people of interest right

Read full topic

item.title: Trugul - Social Random chat idea
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:2, topic:549315”]why would i wanna see a guy jerking it if i need help with math?

if you’re aiming towards educational tutoring and help, I’d say focus on a forum and integrate a peer-to-peer video/audio chat plugin/api etc.[/quote]
how did you get from math to guys jerking off…

As for the idea itself I guess you would want to look at online courses they generally have session abilities where instructors can webcam. I’ve only had a few online courses in my lifetime and not a single instructor actually used that feature so it might be undesirable.

Read full topic
